welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Quakertown, the charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy the beautiful sights and experiences Quakertown has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is the main hub for all flights at Upper Bucks Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private flights and offers exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free with a valid boarding pass.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights, as well as VIP services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Corporate Hangar Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves domestic flights and has a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves flights to and from international destinations and offers a range of services for international travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
